title: I'm Chief Cheese, Midlaner for Chiefs Esports Club, AMA!

replies.body:
Yo Daniel! So I have a bunch of questions about your time on Immunity and Chiefs!
Other than achievements in north american soloq, the team yssc and your top four finish 
under the team immunity organisation, what would be your proudest moment of your
league of legends career?
Of the games you have played, which would be your career favorite?
So my favorite game of you was back on the 26th of March 2015 when you were avant vs 
team Immunity, you were playing swain and showed your dominance with champion mastery
to the extent of being able to control your lane with kills and presence. Sadly, you lost it
overall due to the use of a sub jungler on Sejuani. The show of these skills, do you think in
season 6 will you be able to show the same type of dominance?
From your no. 1 Fans ChrisMisTrees and MsFish (read the 1st letter of every sentence)

Well there isnt much career outside of those! probly my rank 4-6 main smurf during season 4. I worked hard playing alot of swain to reach that!
My career favourite? i have multiple. Generally every time ive played xerath has turned out to be a strong performance full of great snipes. Much love for that champion. 
Ahh yes our sub just was not prepared for competetive play and crumbled under the pressure Xsmithie style{{champion:113}} 

Probably wont show that same lane dominance. The way i played was very agressive since our team desperately (IMO) needed a carry. Chiefs dont need that from me to succeed, it would just make the game more volatile. 

 and yeah. SLIGHTLY UNFORTUNATE IMO. JUST A TAD UNLUCKY
This is a quality MsFish post.
Ha. Clever.
Who do you think are the best champions in the middle lane to get Duskblade on?

Zed is the only one ive really run into. and even then you get it second or third on him. Second if your snowballing. Havent seen much talon but i can imagine people picking it on him as a second or third item.
Swain!?! But my Janna ult is down!
Ive got enough healin for the entire team bro {{item:3065}} {{item:3146}}

Give me 3 words to explain each chief member

Swip3rr -

Spookz -

Cheese -

Raydeer -

EJAM -


Also Do you think Swip3rr is stepping up his game?

Swip3rr - Tank, Safe, split

Spookz - High pressure, Childish

Cheese - Godly, No Roam

Raydeer - Split-push, Safety net

EJAM - Tilted, Flash engage

Swip3rr steps up hard in OPL. He plays super well under pressure and his attitude is generally pretty positive which helps the team environment alot.

1) Are Chiefs the #1 team in Oceania, or are Legacy/Dire Wolves ahead?

2) Who do you think are the top three mid laners, not including yourself in Oceania (Challenger and OPL/OCS)

3) Will you play Swain in the OPL?
hey
Spookz you're too cheesy.
Hey Cheese, always loved your Swain during and before the YSSC days, just wanted to ask why you changed your name.

Good to hear man those were some good times for the swain train.

And which name change specifically? I was initially lQdChEeSe and my friend changed it to an inappropriate name while i was afk from my comp. So i got temp-named (tempname507) and a lot of people began to know me as that as i didnt change it for a long time. I then changed it to lQdChEeSe507 so people would still recognise it to a degree. 

The other names Ive had are 'lilqtcheeseroni' and 'pedantic pumpkin'. just meme names really. But my original tag of Cheese stays now :)
Who do you think enjoys being a Meme most on the team?
Either swip3rr or sp0okz. Sp0okz is one of the biggest memer's ive ever played with.
{{champion:99}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:99}}  why is lux the best mid {{champion:99}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:99}}

Cause shes super easy to pull off, actually lanes pree well vs assasins (the standard control/poke mage counterpicks), and is low risk high reward IMO. Gives your team a win condition in terms of siege and one shotting.

> [{quoted}](name=Chief Cheese,realm=OCE,application-id=ATM3HYki,discussion-id=pc402O0o,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-02-26T07:06:31.153+0000)
>
> Cause shes super easy to pull off, actually lanes pree well vs assasins (the standard control/poke mage counterpicks), and is low risk high reward IMO. Gives your team a win condition in terms of siege and one shotting.

my twitter izzzz https://twitter.com/ hope the link workslol

1) How did it feel filling the shoes of Swiffer? Chiefs have been the team to beat the last few splits and high expectations were put on you to perform as well as swiffer. Did you feel nervous and how did you overcome that pressure? especially now that Legacy seem to be the team to beat.

2) There have been a lot of rumors recently about Chiefs management and players. Got any light to shed on the situation? Externally it doesn't look good but rumors can over exaggerate things pretty easily.

I was very nervous but the meta changed (season 6 changes etc to vision) so filling his shoes wasn't that easy. I couldn't just copy his style i needed to create my own whilst the team also molded their dynamic to the changes. I overcame the pressure mostly by just smashing out alot of practice and vod reviews of strong solo q midlaners, whilst vod reviewing most of my solo q games and scrims. I also watch a lot of LCS now and that helps.

To be honest, i actually haven't heard of any rumors to do with management players? We are moving at a good pace and the relationship between players and management is good. Im really confident in the support staff within the team. Care to enlighten me on any rumors you may have heard? i might be able to clear up information depending on what the rumors are.

Hi Cheese, 

good luck for the coming matches and your team goals. 

A few questions: 

I was wondering, who do you feel are the two biggest threats coming through the Open Ladder and why?

cheers

Hey Cheese, big Chiefs fan and I'm super impressed with the way you've slotted in to the team this spilt and kept them stable.

Just wondering what your match day preparation is like?

I watch specific faker solo q vods (helps me visualise the apm i wanna aim towards as i warm up) while queueing for arams or normals for mechanics practice (to get rid of any anxiety). Also pump alot of curls during champ select / pauses to get rid of the jitters (im not shredded).

Have a couple smokes to but i would definetly not advise going that route.{{champion:104}}
can you possibly expand on the faker vods, i think they could help me improve a lot if they help you (mid plat atm)
Oh i also listen to alot of hip hop stuf to get me pumped : )))
Sweet, I love hip hop. Any specific artist or album you listen to? If you haven't already, check out Run The Jewels, their music is great for getting pumped up.

Haha i used to like stuff like non phixion and ill bill when i was younger now i just use it to pump myself up and get hype'y as hell. Willdo man haha sorry for the late reply btw. In scrims so trying to find time to reply : )
Sorry man alrdy 5 stacked : ((
Why you look so good, but I ain't ever seen you smile?
what lane/role is naut best for oh and i really need help with getting better
Definetly toplane but i think hes also a really good jungle in solo q. Id give u some coaching sessions but im currently taking a break from coaching as im constantly scrimming and its stressful :((

when do u reckon u would be able to coach me? just asking you  seem like a awesome dude
Oh man add me on twitter and private pm me and when i start up ill message you. i might be able to fit you in after next week ? no promises though : ( but maybe!!

just followed ya
Cheers man followed u : )
did you make rituals to sheogorath to get where you are today?

Blood for the blood god ya know gotta do what you gotta do 



Nah but srs hundreds of hours of practice and frustration. all about lookin towards that end goal though ya know?

> Nah but srs hundreds of hours of practice and frustration. all about lookin towards that end goal though ya know?

 the problem i have is i feed way to much

every death u shud write down in a notepad why it occured etc. After like 5-10 games u begin to see pretty obvious trends and you can work on specifically the most common mistake until it gets drilled in. then rinse repeat.
oh no i believe you put in the hours and that you have the skill, lol i was being silly with sheogorath hes one of the elder scrolls game gods who has obsession with cheese :P
Knew the name rung a bell. big oblivion fan
